title: A Respectable Woman - encounter with Gouvernail

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Chopin uses literary elements and techniques to convey Mrs. Baroda’s complex response to her encounter with Gouvernail.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Chopin uses literary elements and techniques to convey Mrs. Baroda’s complex response to her encounter with Gouvernail.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain the function of a character changing or remaining unchanged.
